name: Recourse
description: Curiosity is a sign of intelligence. Will yours take you far enough to discover why Sleet and Floe are stuck on this beautiful desolate planet?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 64-Bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2,0 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 64-Bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2,5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space

reviews.review_text: -I play on another account and my game time is around 7 hrs there- Nice puzzle game with witty dialogue. Main puzzles are mostly moderate difficulty, game world is really peaceful with relaxing music. Question marks(bonus objectives) are a little bit harder and got me stuck sometimes. Other than main missions, there are payload mission stages with heavy action and combat which I haven't yet played much, they look fun but not my style. In overall, it is a good game to play after a long day :)
